# SummitUI

> WCAG-compliant, fully customizable headless Blazor components.

SummitUI is a headless component library for Blazor that provides high-quality, accessible building blocks for your applications. It focuses on logic, accessibility, and performance across all Blazor render modes.

## Components

- [Accordion](/docs/accordion/llms.txt)
- [Checkbox](/docs/checkbox/llms.txt)
- [DateField](/docs/datefield/llms.txt)
- [DropdownMenu](/docs/dropdownmenu/llms.txt)
- [FocusTrap](/docs/focustrap/llms.txt)
- [Popover](/docs/popover/llms.txt)
- [Select](/docs/select/llms.txt)
- [Switch](/docs/switch/llms.txt)
- [Tabs](/docs/tabs/llms.txt)

## Getting Started

- [Installation](/installation)
- [Agent Skills](/agent-skills)

## Principles

- **Headless**: Logic and state management without opinionated styling.
- **Accessible**: Built-in WCAG compliance and ARIA attributes.
- **Performant**: Optimized for WASM, SSR, and Interactive Server modes.
- **Customizable**: Full control over markup and styling via data attributes.
